metadata.title: CVE-2020-11721 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: load_png in loader.c in libsixel.a in libsixel 1.8.6 has an uninitializedpointer leading to an invalid call to free, which can cause a denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
